segments.text: I notice the boy is stretching so far to reach the cookie jar, and the stool is about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s holding a plate in one hand, but he’s not even looking down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for a cookie, her hand outstretched like she’s begging.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to get caught any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so close to turning around and seeing them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how bold they’re being with her right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still running, and the puddle is getting bigger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy even realizes how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to trust him completely, even though he’s about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they hurry up before the stool gives out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a tense moment, and no one else seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR
